amendment.description: An amendment numbered 117 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds to be used by the Environmental Protection Agency for the U.S. Global Change Research Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
